The Blue Max

Ano: 1966

IMDb ID: tt0060177

Sinopse: The tactics of a German fighter pilot offend his aristocratic comrades but win him his country's most honored medal, the Blue Max. The General finds him useful as a hero even though his wife also finds him useful as a love object. In the end the General arranges for him to test-fly an untried fighter.—Ed Stephan
